richTextConfig.content:
“I know as a first responder; you do not look at it as just a job. You do this for your family and community. Saying ‘Thank You’ seems so small during these times, but I hope knowing it comes from my heart and the greatest of respect, those two words are enough.

Thank You For ALL You Do!"

Cindy - Petmate Operations Department

 

“Thank you, health care workers for braving this outbreak head-on, sometimes coming into contact with those affected. You give me hope, and the resolve to do what I can to help keep your exposure as limited as possible.”

Tony - Petmate Graphics Department

 

“Our first responders -  Thank you, for your courageous never ending drive to help others. Putting yourselves in harms way for the saving of others is truly commendable, and I’m forever grateful.”

Debbie - Petmate Operations Department

 

"To all of our First Responders…

thank you…thank you for everything you do day in and day out, especially during this COVID-19 Pandemic.  I pray all of you stay safe, and I hope you feel the gratitude and appreciation from all of us.  You’re on our front lines and we’re forever grateful.  Please know we’re sheltering in place to do everything we can to make your job a little easier!!! Thank you is not enough but I hope it at least brings a smile to your face.  Lord knows you deserve it!”

Keri - Petmate Marketing Department

 

"Dear first responder,

Thank you for being a hero, for giving our children real heroes that make a difference and not for playing sports or singing .  Thank you seems like a mild phrase to express the extreme gratitude we feel for taking care of our loved ones.  Thank you for putting your lives on hold.  Thank you for the risks you are taking.  Thank you for showing others what it is to be a compassionate human.  Thank you for inspiring other to do what they can to help you and others in need.  Thank you.  We cannot survive without you.”

Suzanne - Petmate Product Development Department

 

“To our healthcare workers and first responders,

Thank you for continuing to provide care during this challenging time.

Thank you for the sacrifices you’re making in order to save others.  

My family prays for the obedience of the community and strength and peace for you.”

Lauren - Petmate Customer Service Department

 

"First Responder Heroes:

for your selfless acts of caring,

for doing so much with so little,

for your tireless efforts to save lives,

for risking yourself for the sake of others,

for sacrificing time with family so others can enjoy theirs,

we say…

THANK YOU!"

Ron - Petmate Product Development Department

 

“There are times in everyone’s life when things are put into perspective, and what truly matters in our everyday lives. It may be naive on my part, but it never crossed my mind that our first responders would ever have to face something like this across the entire world.     

As I watch the news and listen to the media report on this horrific situation, we are all facing, it amazes me to watch you all. It never ceases to amaze me the selflessness I see, I see you running to the virus instead of away from it. You put other people’s wellbeing before your own, trying to help in anyway you can, providing comfort and support in a chaotic mess. I’m not sure how many others could do what you have been doing day in and day out over the past months. What you are doing has to be difficult, challenging, and even a little frightening at times.

Unfortunately, with social distancing words are the only way for me to express my gratitude to you and your families. This disaster has given me an entirely new outlook on what you can be faced with in a moments notice. even after the COVID 19 has been defeated, your level of heroism will not diminish.

Thank you for everything you have done and continue to do!"

Tom - Petmate Operations Department

 

“Thank You Healthcare Workers, on the front lines, who are risking your health to care for and save others.  While these acts of bravery and selflessness may come easy to you, please know we appreciate and acknowledge all that you are doing during this battle.  You are working tireless hours and you need to know that you matter and the work you are doing is making a difference. Your dedication and courage are unwavering, and we pray for your health and safety."

Stay Strong,

Alice - Petmate Executive Department

 

"Dear Health Care Workers, 

I cannot express my gratitude for all that you are doing now and when I was going through my cancer treatment.  You are truly heroes.  Thank you again for all that you are doing”

Donna - Administrative Department

 

"To All First Responders,

Your selfless action to help others is remarkable and makes you true heroes.  Especially those in our hardest hit areas of the country.  You storm into harm’s way so that others will be healed and comforted.  We all thank you from the bottom of our hearts.  It is that spirit and drive that makes us a great people and gives us confidence that we will not only survive this crisis – we will once again thrive.  Thank you!”

Chris - Petmate Marketing Department

 

“Thank you for your bravery and hard work during a very difficult time.  We appreciate everything that you are doing to combat this pandemic and save lives.”

Diane - Petmate Product Development Department

 

“Thank you for your endless dedication, love, compassion and continuous hard work of going above and beyond, pushing yourself past exhausting and all the stress everyday to help doctors, fellow nurses and patients.  Your work is not easy work and takes a very special kind of person to do what you do – you are appreciated beyond words; you are prayed for fiercely for strength and knowledge and protection. Without you, our country would be in shambles and it is because of you that we are not! Our country rallies behind you - thank you does not express our gratitude of our humbled spirits for ALL that you do! You are an angel on this earth, a warrior on the front lines and we appreciate EVERYTHING you do!”

Christine - Petmate Consumer Service Department

 

“Thank You to all that serve the Call. Having a Brother in Law that is a Doctor and a Son in Law as a Nurse during these dark times I feel especially grateful to all of our Doctors, Nurses, First Responders, Police and All that work the front lines in Hospitals to defeat this Virus words cannot suffice to the gratitude we all feel for youðŸ˜Š

Because God is with us…. We can face, confront, deal and in the end overcome this challenge!  Jesus taught His followers that all troubles are passing in nature for a season and a reason.  Hold onto the Peace that God gives confident that He is watching, directing and caring for those who trust in Him.

God bless you all   as we give Thanks and Praise to you”

Dan - Petmate Sales Department

 

“To our healthcare workers here in North Texas, and across the country,

 My family wants to thank you all for your dedication, and the willingness to take risks each day, caring for both those afflicted with Covid-19, as well as the many other patients facing day to day medical issues, and serious conditions.

Whether directly caring for Covid-19 patients or not, we can only imagine the level of increased stress and anxiety you’re facing at this time.  We also realize and appreciate the sacrifice you might be making to keep your own family safe from infection.

When you chose your path in healthcare, you already became one of the contributors to the betterment of our society. In the current environment you and your peers are elevated to HERO status, truly saving lives and helping families cope in so many ways.

Our sincere thanks to you and those by your side!”

Be Safe.

Darren, Jen and Dylan - Petmate Sales Department

 

"Thank you for stepping up in this time of great need. You have taken a risk for yourself and your family, for the betterment of us all. You give us hope and I hope these words can give you strength. Thank you for all you do, it literally means the world."

Lisa - Petmate Marketing Department

 

"To you – My Hero,

It is a truly selfless of you to be willing to sacrifice peace of mind to help those who are in need.  Your help and dedication have not gone unnoticed.  We support you in spirit and prayer.  Thank you for being brave and caring.

 God bless you and your family."

 Robyne - Petmate Accounting Department

 

"Hello First Responder,

First, your bravery to be on the front lines is amazing. Second, you must know that all of us behind you appreciate you every day!

Sending virtual hugs your way. Hang tough!!!”

Melinda - Pemate Sales Department

 

"Thank you, thank you, thank you.

There are not enough words to express the gratitude we have for all that you do each day. Be safe an remember to take a moment to yourself to remind yourself that being a hero is something you already are and being a hero isn’t easy, but totally worth it. 

I assure you that we are staying at home other than to buy groceries and are leading by example here. Please let us know how else we can support the amazing and tough work you are doing."

Jennifer  - Petmate Operations Department

 

“Thank you for working tirelessly day and night to save lives, provide comfort and teach us how to care for ourselves and the ones we love.  Real heroes don’t wear capes.  They wear scrubs.  You are angels who open the eyes of newborns and gently close the eyes of a dying man.  It is indeed a big privilege to be FIRST and LAST to witness the Beginning and the End of Life. 

 You are braver than you believe, stronger than you think and MORE LOVED THAN YOU WILL EVER KNOW.

With Love and Prayers"

Kathy - Petmate Information Technology Department

 

"From our hearts we thank the first responders that put not only Their health but the health of their loved ones on the line to protect against this Virus we keep you in our prayers daily. "

Ron - Petmate Operations Department

 

"To all the first responders,

While we are all trying our best to get through this difficult time, some people are called upon to actually put their lives on the line to help their fellow Americans.  It is with the utmost respect that the rest of us say thank you for all that you do and for all the sacrifices you make to help others.  It is people like you that make this country so wonderful!"

 Thank you,

 Scott - Petmate Sales Department

 

“Thank you to all the Police, Fire-Fighters, Doctors, Nurses, Volunteers and Military for all that you are doing. We really appreciate everything you do so we can get through this time. Keep up the great work and stay safe.”

Tim - Petmate Information Technology Department

 

“THANK YOU to our first responders and health care workers.  Thank you for the investment you made in your knowledge and career and ability to help others in need.  Thank you for taking the additional step of putting yourself in harms way for the sole purpose of helping a fellow human being.  We know you are concerned about protecting yourself and your loved ones while faced with long days and nights in the face of a potential epidemic.  We appreciate your sacrifices and look forward to your life getting back to normal.  Hopefully sooner rather than later.  THANK YOU!”

 Sincerely,
Rick - Petmate Sales Department

 

“Thank you!

We are ever so grateful for your service and sacrifice during this challenging time.

You are amazing!”

Amy - Petmate Sales Department

 

"To all First Responders: 

I would like to greatly thank you for all! I’m sure that you know how valuable you all are but more than ever you are truly a blessing to have helping our communities during this pandemic. I pray you and your family maintain sanity and health during these hard times. I want to also say a special thank you to those that have supported you at home while you are out there saving lives. God bless you all and THANK YOU AGAIN!!”

 Juana - Petmate HR Department

 

"To Our First Responders:

 Words cannot begin to capture the gratitude for and pure awe of the services you perform every day during this pandemic!  I pray each day for your endurance and protection as you work so hard to care for others, selflessly exhausting yourself both physically and mentally as you bear the weight of your burdens AND ours.  My heart goes out to you as you surely suffer through a much higher level of sadness and despair – but please know that you are bringing hope to all of us that we will get this virus under control and get back to some sense of normalcy.

 Endless thanks and prayers for your safety!”

 Sandy - Petmate Accounting Department

 

"Thank you all for not only making the sacrifice by putting your self in harms way to take care of us but in being separated from your families as well.  Your actions are saving lives everyday and your actions are appreciated by everyone – whether they communicate it or not.  We acknowledge that when you started in this line of work this is nothing like you anticipated but we are very grateful that you did.  You are there for us – Thank you!"

Scott - Petmate Sales Department

 

“As we have all seen recently, the world can turn upside down in a matter of days. One thing that we can always count on during crisis is our health care workers and other first responders who are on the frontlines of the COVID-19 pandemic risking their health and welfare every day for the sake of others. You have made a difference with your bravery, skill, and passion in this time of need. Thank you for all that you are doing.”

Richard - Petmate Consumer Marketing Department

 

“Thank you seems to be an inadequate response to the acts of selflessness and perseverance of all first responders. 

For the medical personal (including all hospital workers, lab technicians, nurses and doctors, pharmacists and pharmacy staff), I am humbled by your acts of daily service.  In a world without COVID-19, you are an unsung hero.  You provide healing to those in your care and hope to their families.  In this world where COVID-19 lurks around corners, you step into action knowing you are putting yourselves at risk.  I will stay home and encourage others to do so because other than saying thank you and lifting you up in prayer (which I do), that is the only way I know to help reduce you burden. 

 For all of our emergency first responders (police, fire, EMT’s, military) that continue to tirelessly serve knowing every interaction is a risk, thank you.  Thank you for protecting and serving for us in the best of times and stepping up even more in the most frightening times.

 For all of the farmers, manufacturing & distribution workers, truckers, delivery drivers, grocery store workers  - you have always been the backbone of this nation.  Thank you for standing stronger and working harder to keep this country going.  Thank you for stepping into what may sometimes feel like a war zone to make sure we have what we need to sustain.  Thank you for the times I have seen you act with grace when your customer didn’t.  Your work, your presence, your consistency brings comfort and hope to so many. 

 To the families of ALL first responders, I can not imagine the worry and burden that you carry.  I am thankful for your service as well.  You and your loved one are in my daily prayers.” 

Best,

Erica - Petmate Marketing Department

 

"Dear Brave Ones,

I want to thank you for the work you do everyday to serve your communities, but now more than ever, thank you for the service that you provide to keep Americans healthy and the country operational. Your compassion, kindness and brave spirit are what is keeping this nation going during this unprecedented health crisis. I thank you sincerely for the work you are doing on the front lines, risking your own health, to protect those in your communities. Whether you are shopping for a family who cannot go to the store or sitting with a patient because their family cannot visit,  your commitment to others is remarkable and honorable. You are true heroes. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.”

Jennifer - Petmate Marketing Department

 

"A BIG Thank you to those medical professionals that are constantly putting themselves in harms way with Covid-19 and continuously putting the health of others before themselves.  We appreciate YOU and all that you are sacrificing each and every day!  THANK YOU!"

 Lynda - Petmate Sales Department

 

"Thank you so much for staring this terrible disease in the face.  We see you.  We do not take you for granted.  Thank you for your sacrifice.  I pray God protects you and keeps you safe.

Love,"

Joanna - Pemate Executive Department
